short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to input text through a popup and submit it to ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension provides an AI-powered Senior Software Product Owner, the Test Genius, to streamline your software testing process. Click the button and enter your text to generate user stories and formulate both positive and negative acceptance criteria. Using your input as a reference, the Test Genius will assist in creating detailed test scenarios. Enhance your testing efforts and ensure comprehensive test coverage with the Test Genius.
